sections.title: Eldritch Knight (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Eldritch Knight class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Weapon and Armor Proficiency (Eldritch Knight)
sections.description: Eldritch knights gain no proficiency with any weapon or armor when taking levels in this prestige class.

sections.title: Bonus Feat (Eldritch Knight)
sections.description: Eldritch knights gain bonus combat feats at 1st, 5th, and 9th level, still requiring prerequisites to be met.

sections.title: Diverse Training (Eldritch Knight)
sections.description: Eldritch knight levels count as fighter levels and arcane spellcasting class levels for the purpose of meeting feat prerequisites.

sections.title: Spells per Day (Eldritch Knight)
sections.description: At indicated levels, eldritch knights advance spellcasting progression of a previous arcane class, gaining spells per day, spells known, and caster level increases.

sections.title: Spell Critical (Su) (Eldritch Knight)
sections.description: At 10th level, when confirming a critical hit, the eldritch knight can cast a spell as a swift action targeting the attack's target without provoking attacks of opportunity.
